item.title: Having Faith until the End
item.description: I am thankful to the Lord that I currently belong to a Christ-centered local church where the bible is taught consistently, week after week, in an authoritative and practical manner. I have also had been blessed, for the past 11 years, to have had access to very sound and balanced teaching on how to live the new Covenant life just as Jesus intended. Consequently, during most Sunday and mid-week meetings, the likelihood of hearing a teaching that is new is very little.
